TEXT: A half-girl half-horse with a dream. She was born to run, and she runs with purpose. NL Relies on legacies and a strong support network for victory.
NL You prepare your signature drop kick...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~equine~ ~one,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
